## Part 1

### Load Data
```{r load_data}
library(datasets)
data(WorldPhones)
WorldPhones
```

### Clean Data
```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, comment = NA}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

WorldPhones %>%
    as.data.frame() %>%
    mutate(year = factor(row.names(WorldPhones))) %>%
    gather(country, number, -year) %>%
    mutate(country = factor(country))
    
```
